questions.question: This term refers to a device that converts kinetic energy from the wind into electrical power.
This component of a wind turbine houses the generator and other key components.
This type of wind turbine has blades that rotate around a horizontal axis.
questions.answer: What is a Horizontal Axis Wind Turbine (HAWT)?

questions.question: This term refers to the practice of placing multiple wind turbines in a single location to generate electricity.
This component of a wind turbine is responsible for converting mechanical energy into electrical energy.
